name: Hieromourn
description: A towering figure in cracked moonsteel, draped in ash-stained vestments and etched prayers. A featureless helm shaped like a waning moon hides his face. A burning censer swings at his side, and a low, unbroken chant hums from within his armor.
abilities: Sacred Unity (Passive): Hieromourn counts as two models for the purpose of determining whether nearby Covenant units become Illumed via Ashen Communion.
Liturgical Gravity (Passive): While this model is Illumed, it and all friendly Moonfall Covenant units within 3" gain the Anchored rule.
